thread.title: Rare.us Seeks 'Millennial Game-changers' for Under 40 Award
thread.title_full: Rare.us Seeks 'Millennial Game-changers' for Under 40 Award

author: Rare.us
title: Rare.us Seeks 'Millennial Game-changers' for Under 40 Award
text:
WASHINGTON , Oct. 8,   Rare.us, one of America's fastest-growing media sites, is seeking "millennial game-changers" for its Under 40 Awards . Rare's inaugural Under 40 Awards celebrates individuals between the ages of 18 and 39 who inspire others through their convictions. A video that details who the site is seeking and how to nominate for the awards, is hosted at Rare on YouTube .  Now accepting nominees through Nov. 6 , recipients will represent a cross-section of America's passions and accomplishments, while spanning professions, interests, degrees, geographies and nationalities. 
Winners of the distinction, plus one guest, will be flown to Rare's Washington, D.C. home base and honored in a special Rare Under 40 Awards dinner event during spring 2016.  
To nominate a game-changer, submit a two-minute video at rare.us/story/the-rare-under-40/ or post a video on social media with the hashtag #BeRare. For a list of official rules, visit here . 
Rare.us, a media site incubated inside parent company Cox Media Group's Fans 1 st Media division, is one of the fastest-growing media sites in the United States â€“ boasting 40 million monthly visits. Dubbed "America's News Feed," Rare leverages social media to cover national news, politics, culture and more, driving conversation by delivering buzzworthy content Americans like to share. Engage with Rare on Facebook and Twitter .
Video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=72ht1KrozMg
